  "explanation": "The Hotjar cookie mentioned interacts with a Survey invitation modal popup and ensures that the same invite does not re-appear if it has already been shown. This function closely aligns with Service Personalisation because it tailors the experience based on user interaction history. No other listed purposes directly relate to preventing repetitive survey invitations or managing survey interactions.",
